description: Situated in a tranquil location overlooking the vineyards, this winery and elegant restaurant is owned by the “Prophet” Hernanes, a Brazilian footballer who played for many years in the Italian championship. The menu here features regional dishes alongside a few more creative options, while five modern guestrooms (some with a view) and a panoramic swimming pool complete the picture.
